body_text: Hi Siddharth Giyamalani,       Sharing Premium QR of the Ashoka and Samrat Hotel for brand approval.  Please Note: The brand logo shared by you is low-res we need the Hi-res brand logo before releasing the artwork     Thanks  Rakesh
body:
Hi Siddharth Giyamalani,


Sharing Premium QR of the Ashoka and Samrat Hotel for brand approval. 
Please Note: The brand logo shared by you is low-res we need the Hi-res brand logo before releasing the artwork

Thanks
Rakesh
